column2: Alfresco Software, Inc. and the Activiti developer community
column8: Modeler, Simulation, Execution. Data elements are not supported. Limited supported formats (read/saved internally in BPMN format without exporting capabilities).

column12: Subscription. Price based on number of users,  computing power and support levels.

column8: Integrate with ArchiMate, User collaboration, Support for Collaboration diagrams, BPMN 2.0 XML Export & Import,
Supports several formats (read: BPMN, jBPM, Bonita, XPDL, write: Bonita, BPMN2, PNG, JPG, GIF, PDF, BMP, SVG).

column12: Proprietary - 14-day free trial on team accounts / Free professional accounts for educators and students / Free version

column8: Read: MS Visio.    Write: MS Visio, EMF, PDF.
Includes BPMN, UML, ArchiMate SysML, Java round trip code generation, documentation, TOGAF, XSD, WSDL.
